segments.text: Well it ’ s my first night in Beijing . What should I eat ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well you have to try Peking duck .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Mm , I don ’ t really like duck to be honest with you . I fancy something light .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ok , you could try the Peking wonton then .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That sounds like a good idea . Where should I go to eat that ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Actually , I know a great restaurant in Dongcheng .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Ok then , I ’ ll follow you .
segments.speaker: S1
